mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MEMBER_INTEREST_CLUB ( member_no, club_no ) VALUES ( #{memberNo},#{clubNo})
mapper.select: SELECT c.CLUB_NO FROM club c LEFT JOIN ( SELECT CLUB_NO, COUNT(*) AS like_count FROM likes WHERE IS_LIKED = 'Y' GROUP BY CLUB_NO ) lc ON c.CLUB_NO = lc.CLUB_NO WHERE c.USE_YN = 'Y' AND c.CATEGORY_ID = #{categoryId} ORDER BY COALESCE(lc.like_count, 0) DESC, c.CLUB_NO FETCH FIRST 1 ROW ONLY
